name: Fireboy and Watergirl 3: The Ice Temple
summary: Fireboy and Watergirl in The Ice Temple is a cooperative platformer and the 3rd entry in the Fireboy and Watergirl series. You navigate characters Fireboy and Watergirl - either alone or with a friend - through various puzzles. Fireboy can walk in lava, but not in water. Watergirl can walk in water, but not in lava. Turn levers, press buttons, push boxes, and more.
